abstract: News analysis; Palestinian bid for full membership in United Nations United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization is putting organization and Washington in an urgent bind; United States legislation, dating back more than 15 years, mandates a complete cutoff of American financing to any United Nations agency that accepts the Palestinians as a full member.
snippet: American legislation dating back more than 15 years mandates a cutoff of financing to any United Nations agency that accepts the Palestinians as a full member.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization

lead_paragraph: American legislation dating back more than 15 years mandates a cutoff of financing to any United Nations agency that accepts the Palestinians as a full member.

headline.main: Palestinian Bid for Full Unesco Membership Imperils American Financing
headline.print_headline: Palestinian Bid for Full Unesco Membership Imperils American Financing
headline.seo: Palestinian Bid to Join Unesco Could Imperil U.S. Funds
